name: Mono
description: Mono is compilation of 3 short horror stories that form an underlying narrative.Figure out the pieces to the puzzle by surviving the games and finding the passwords.Mono will feature 3 stories, I Want To Get Out, The Monster Within, The Creator Revealed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bits Processor: Intel I3-6100H - AMD A8 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bits Processor: Intel I5 4th gen - AMD FX 6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 - R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
